channel.title: Best Combat
channel.description:
Well I was curious on what the community thought is the best source with the highest quality combat compared to runescapes, honestly I'm on the fence, I'm considering either [b]Final Devolution 2.7[/b] or [b]317 Battlescape[/b]. Killamess or Palidino; unsure to who.
What do you think is better as a base?

item.title: Best Combat
item.dc:creator: @Three_One_Seven Three One Seven
item.description:
@Three_One_Seven wrote:

`Aaron:

Take a look at both of the programmers, Palidino ran a successful server and everytime he shuts it down for a year and brings it back he still gets 300-400 players. Kilamess isn’t really in that caliber.

Good point, but what combat system is of better quality is my question.

Read full topic

item.title: Best Combat
item.dc:creator: @Three_One_Seven Three One Seven
item.description:
@Three_One_Seven wrote:

Hmmm typically both are important to me, so both.

And I dislike PI because everyone just uses it to leech, nothings changed from majority servers.

Read full topic

item.title: Best Combat
item.dc:creator: @Rixxx Rix_
item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

I haven’t tested both… by combat do you mean PvP or PvN? PvN is more important IMO.

Don't make a mistake and [i]don't[/i] use PI, I'd rather play Delta now, what the fuck does that say.
Am I correct? :D

Read full topic
